member.name: M:LuhnValidator.Luhn.IsValid(System.String)
member.summary: This method validates the credit card number.
member.param: The credit card number to validate.
member.returns: A value indicating whether or not the credit card number is valid.

member.name: M:LuhnValidator.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: This is the driver method, and the main entry point of execution at runtime.
